Saintess of Elmore-Aden Solina:
My spirit weakened, too long time I was ground in this place... I am afraid that I can not receive all particulars of a present situation. But I precisely know that Yudif and his organization are connected to appearance of powers of darkness of Shilen. If at you it will not turn out to stop them and to protect Seven Seals, the world already never will return on our lands!
Ask that it is necessary to make
